translated: The appearance is the appearance of the state of passion, and the near attainment is the appearance of the state of passionlessness.

original: de nas shes pa dang shes bya byung ba zang ba'i rnam par mi rtog pa sangs rgyas gcig gi rang bzhin nam mkha' kun ni khams gsum pa la gnas pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi ngo bo rang gi sems ni 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin lnga par shes
analyzed: de nas shes pa dang shes bya byung ba zang ba'i rnam par mi rtog pa sangs rgyas gcig gi rang bzhin nam mkha' kun ni khams gsum pa la gnas pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi ngo bo rang gi sems ni 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin lnga par shes
translated: Then, the fifth should be known as the nature of the single buddha, the nonconceptual state of the withdrawal of the arising of consciousness and the object of consciousness, the nature of the clear light of one’s own mind, which is the essence of all migrating beings, abiding in the three realms, the all-pervading space.

original: par bya'o // de nyid brtan par bya ba'i phyir yan lag gsum pa bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: par bya'o // de nyid brtan par bya ba'i phyir yan lag gsum pa bshad par bya ste /
translated: In order to stabilize that, the third branch should be explained.

original: ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin ni me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin ni me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The nature of the five pristine consciousnesses is the nature of the mirror-like and so on.

original: de la thig le ni gsal ba nyid me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
analyzed: de la thig le ni gsal ba nyid me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
translated: The bindu is clarity, which is the mirror-like pristine consciousness.

original: khams thams cad mtshungs pa nyid ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: khams thams cad mtshungs pa nyid ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
translated: The sameness of all constituents is the pristine consciousness of uniformity.

original: de ni bde ba chen po la spyod pa la so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: de ni bde ba chen po la spyod pa la so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
translated: That is the wisdom of discernment, which experiences great bliss.

original: de'i 'od zer spro ba dang @311b bsdu bas 'gro ba'i don bya ba ni bya ba nan tan grub pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: de'i 'od zer spro ba dang @311b bsdu bas 'gro ba'i don bya ba ni bya ba nan tan grub pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The performance of the welfare of beings through the emission and re-absorption of light rays is the wisdom of successful action.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang don dam pa byang chub sems kyi ngo bo ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang don dam pa byang chub sems kyi ngo bo ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
translated: The perfection of wisdom and the ultimate essence of the bodhisattva is the wisdom of the utterly pure sphere of reality.

original: de bas na ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de bas na ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin no //
translated: Therefore, it is the nature of the five wisdoms.

original: rlung dang nye ba'i rlung bcu nye bar sdud par byed pas gnas pa'i skabs su dbugs so //
analyzed: rlung dang nye ba'i rlung bcu nye bar sdud par byed pas gnas pa'i skabs su dbugs so //
translated: The breath is the stage of abiding because it causes the ten winds and the ten near-winds to gather.

original: 'byung ba lnga'i ngo bo nyid ni lus te /
analyzed: 'byung ba lnga'i ngo bo nyid ni lus te /
translated: The body is the essence of the five elements.

original: de'i snying por gyur pas sra ba dang gsher ba dang dro ba dang / 'gro ba dang 'o nga ba dang khong stong dang ldan pa'i phyir rol //
analyzed: de'i snying por gyur pas sra ba dang gsher ba dang dro ba dang / 'gro ba dang 'o nga ba dang khong stong dang ldan pa'i phyir rol //
translated: It is the body because it is the core of that, possessing solidity, fluidity, heat, movement, and emptiness.

original: thig le'i gzugs de nyid ni gong bu'i gzugs kyis ni phung po la sogs pa thams cad bsdus pa'i ngo bo yungs kar gyi tshad tsam rtsa dbus ma dang rdo rje'i lam nas phyung nas sna'i rtse mo ste de'i rtse mor brtag pa ni bsdu bar bya'o //
analyzed: thig le'i gzugs de nyid ni gong bu'i gzugs kyis ni phung po la sogs pa thams cad bsdus pa'i ngo bo yungs kar gyi tshad tsam rtsa dbus ma dang rdo rje'i lam nas phyung nas sna'i rtse mo ste de'i rtse mor brtag pa ni bsdu bar bya'o //
translated: That very form of the drop, the nature of the collection of all aggregates, etc., the size of a mustard seed, having been drawn out through the central channel and the path of the vajra, should be examined, i.e., collected, at the tip of the nose, i.e., at its tip.

original: rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i 'od zer gyi tshogs steng nas kyang spro ba /
analyzed: rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i 'od zer gyi tshogs steng nas kyang spro ba /
translated: The jewel, which is five-colored, is the collection of the light rays of the five Tathagatas, which are emitted from above.

original: srog dang rtsol ba ni srog dang rtsol ba ste ;
analyzed: srog dang rtsol ba ni srog dang rtsol ba ste ;
translated: The life and exertion are the life and exertion.

original: yan lag gsum pa'o //
analyzed: yan lag gsum pa'o //
translated: This is the third branch.

original: rang sngags ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: rang sngags ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: One’s own mantra is Great Vajradhara.

original: snying gar bsams pa ni sgom pa ste /
analyzed: snying gar bsams pa ni sgom pa ste /
translated: The thought at the heart is the meditation.

original: srog ni steng dang 'og tu rgyu ba kha dog lnga'i rlung ste /
analyzed: srog ni steng dang 'og tu rgyu ba kha dog lnga'i rlung ste /
translated: The life is the five-colored wind moving above and below.

original: thig ler gyur pa ni thig le dang dbyer med par gyur par bzhag pa ni bsreg par bya'o //
analyzed: thig ler gyur pa ni thig le dang dbyer med par gyur par bzhag pa ni bsreg par bya'o //
translated: The drop is the drop, which is to be placed as inseparable. This is the burning.

original: de'i tshe rang dbang ni snga ma bzhin du dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe rang dbang ni snga ma bzhin du dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: At that time, the self-empowerment is the same as before, namely, the sense organ, the object, and the consciousness.

original: de bzhin du rin chen ni thig le'i rin chen de dag pa na /
analyzed: de bzhin du rin chen ni thig le'i rin chen de dag pa na /
translated: Similarly, the jewel is the jewel of the drop.🔽When that is purified,

original: gzung ba ni rdo rje'i rtse mo'am padma'i lte par srog la sogs pa nye bar sdud cing gnas pa gang yin pa de ni 'dzin pa ste yan lag bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: gzung ba ni rdo rje'i rtse mo'am padma'i lte par srog la sogs pa nye bar sdud cing gnas pa gang yin pa de ni 'dzin pa ste yan lag bzhi pa'o //
translated: the retention is the retention of the life-force, and so on, at the tip of the vajra or in the center of the lotus.

original: 'gog pa rdo rjer zhugs pa ni 'od gsal ba la zhugs pa'i sems te /
analyzed: 'gog pa rdo rjer zhugs pa ni 'od gsal ba la zhugs pa'i sems te /
translated: The entry into the vajra of cessation is the mind that has entered the clear light.

original: sems kyis byin gyis brlabs pa phung po dang khams dang skye mched du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: sems kyis byin gyis brlabs pa phung po dang khams dang skye mched du gyur pa'o //
translated: The empowerment of the mind is the transformation of the aggregates, elements, and sense bases.

original: mtshan ma'i rtags de nye bar 'dzin ni lhun gyis grub pa ste so sor snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur na skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtshan ma'i rtags de nye bar 'dzin ni lhun gyis grub pa ste so sor snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur na skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The retention of the sign of the sign is the spontaneous presence, the arising of the individual appearances.

original: mtshan ma de yang byang chub rdo rje ste rdo rje 'chang chen pos rnam pa lnga gsungs pa ni bka' stsal to //
analyzed: mtshan ma de yang byang chub rdo rje ste rdo rje 'chang chen pos rnam pa lnga gsungs pa ni bka' stsal to //
translated: That sign is also the enlightenment vajra, which is the Great Vajradhara.

original: sa'i khams chu la thim pa ni smig rgyu lta bur snang ba dang / chu'i khams mel thim pa na du ba lta bur snang ba dang / me'i khams rlung la thim pa na nam mkha'i dang 'dra ba ni mkha' snang ste /
analyzed: sa'i khams chu la thim pa ni smig rgyu lta bur snang ba dang / chu'i khams mel thim pa na du ba lta bur snang ba dang / me'i khams rlung la thim pa na nam mkha'i dang 'dra ba ni mkha' snang ste /
translated: The earth element dissolves into water, and one sees a mirage-like appearance.🔽The water element dissolves into fire, and one sees a smoke-like appearance.

original: g-yo @312a * //🔽ba srog chags kyi nor bu'o //🔽rlung gi khams ni rnam par shes pa la thim pa na mar me lta bu'o //
analyzed: g-yo @312a * // ba srog chags kyi nor bu'o // rlung gi khams ni rnam par shes pa la thim pa na mar me lta bu'o //
translated: The fire element dissolves into wind, and one sees an appearance like the flame of a butter lamp.🔽The wind element dissolves into consciousness, and one sees an appearance like the glow of a firefly.

original: rnam par shes pa 'od gsal ba la thim pa ni nyi ma phyed kyi dri ma med cing rlung med pa'i nam mkha' dang 'dra ba snang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa 'od gsal ba la thim pa ni nyi ma phyed kyi dri ma med cing rlung med pa'i nam mkha' dang 'dra ba snang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Consciousness dissolves into luminosity, and one sees an appearance like the sky at dawn, free from clouds and dust.

original: mtshan ma de dag brtan par bltas nas /
analyzed: mtshan ma de dag brtan par bltas nas /
translated: Having seen those signs,

original: rdo rje'i lam nas thig le'i 'od zer spro zhing de dag gis nam mkha'i khams gang bar bsams shing de dang 'dra ba rjes su 'dra ba la dmigs te /
analyzed: rdo rje'i lam nas thig le'i 'od zer spro zhing de dag gis nam mkha'i khams gang bar bsams shing de dang 'dra ba rjes su 'dra ba la dmigs te /
translated: one should visualize the light rays of the bindu spreading out from the vajra path, filling the realm of space, and focus on the similar subsequent appearance.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams spro ba ni rjes su dran pa ste yan lag lnga pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams spro ba ni rjes su dran pa ste yan lag lnga pa'o //
translated: The emission of the Tathagatas, who are like the body of Great Vajradhara, is the fifth branch, recollection.

original: de la ni de'i so sor snang ba ste /
analyzed: de la ni de'i so sor snang ba ste /
translated: In that, there is the appearance of each one,

original: sgyu ma dang smig rgyu dang dri za'i grong khyer lta bu so sor snang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgyu ma dang smig rgyu dang dri za'i grong khyer lta bu so sor snang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: which appears as an illusion, a mirage, and a city of gandharvas.

original: de nas thabs dang shes rab snyoms bar 'jug pa ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang gnyis su med par sbyor bas dngos po thams cad ni sems can dang snod kyi 'jig rten gyi dbye bas gnas pa dang / sngar spros pas de dag gong bu'i tshul gyis bsdus pa ni gcig tu byas te /
analyzed: de nas thabs dang shes rab snyoms bar 'jug pa ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang gnyis su med par sbyor bas dngos po thams cad ni sems can dang snod kyi 'jig rten gyi dbye bas gnas pa dang / sngar spros pas de dag gong bu'i tshul gyis bsdus pa ni gcig tu byas te /
translated: Then, the union of means and wisdom is the nondual union with the wisdom seal. All things, divided into the world of sentient beings and the world of the environment, and the previously emitted [Buddhas], gathered in the manner of a collection, are made into one.

original: kun rdzob dang don dam ba tha mi dad pa'i tshul gyis bsdus pa ste /
analyzed: kun rdzob dang don dam ba tha mi dad pa'i tshul gyis bsdus pa ste /
translated: They are gathered by the method of the nondifference of the conventional and the ultimate.

original: dbus su ni de gnyis tha mi dad pa'i dbus te /
analyzed: dbus su ni de gnyis tha mi dad pa'i dbus te /
translated: In the center, the center of the nondifference of those two,

original: gzugs ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku bsgom par bya'o //
translated: one should meditate on the form of Great Vajradhara.

original: de yang ci tsam gyi sems can rdzogs pa ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi dbyings rdzogs pa ste /
analyzed: de yang ci tsam gyi sems can rdzogs pa ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi dbyings rdzogs pa ste /
translated: Moreover, the perfection of sentient beings is the perfection of the realm of intuition of nondwelling nirvana.

original: ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba yan lag drug par gnas par rab tu grags pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba yan lag drug par gnas par rab tu grags pa'o //
translated: This is well known as the six-branched yoga called “concentration.”

original: phan yon bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: phan yon bshad par bya ste /
translated: The benefits should be explained.

original: so sor sdud la snyoms par 'jug pa ni spyod pa rnam pa gsum gyis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam yid la byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas yul rnams la spyod na sngags rnams thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de mi bskyod pa la sogs pas
analyzed: so sor sdud la snyoms par 'jug pa ni spyod pa rnam pa gsum gyis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam yid la byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas yul rnams la spyod na sngags rnams thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de mi bskyod pa la sogs pas
translated: When one who is engaged in the transcendent path attends to the objects by means of the three kinds of conduct, namely, entering into the state of withdrawal, all mantras, all tathāgatas, Akṣhobhya, and so on,

original: byin gyis rlob pa ste /
analyzed: byin gyis rlob pa ste /
translated: bless him.

original: de'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba'o //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba'o //
translated: He becomes of their nature. This is the encouragement of the tathāgatas.

original: bsam gtan ni yan lag lnga pa ye shes ni de mngon du rtogs pa de la snyoms par 'jug cing thob nas /
analyzed: bsam gtan ni yan lag lnga pa ye shes ni de mngon du rtogs pa de la snyoms par 'jug cing thob nas /
translated: Having attained the concentration, which is the five-branched intuition, and entered into it,

original: mngon shes lnga ni lha'i mig la sogs pa thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: mngon shes lnga ni lha'i mig la sogs pa thob par 'gyur te /
translated: he attains the five superknowledges, the divine eye, and so on.

original: yul dang dbang po'i rang bzhin yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul dang dbang po'i rang bzhin yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the complete knowledge of the nature of the object and the sense faculty.

original: de nas srog dang rtsol ba ni rlung gi de kho na nyid @312b dang ; sngags kyi de kho na nyid yongs su shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis /
analyzed: de nas srog dang rtsol ba ni rlung gi de kho na nyid @312b dang ; sngags kyi de kho na nyid yongs su shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis /
translated: Then, through the samādhi characterized by the complete knowledge of the reality of the vital wind and the reality of the mantra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa khyad par dang ldan pa rnams kyis gzigs pa ni lta bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa khyad par dang ldan pa rnams kyis gzigs pa ni lta bar gyur pa'o //
translated: the bodhisattvas are seen by those endowed with special qualities, such as the wheel-holders, and so forth.

original: de bzhin du 'dzin pa'i stobs ni brtan pa nyid kyis rdo rje sems dpa' ni rdo rje 'chang chen po sku yang dag 'jug ni thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dzin pa'i stobs ni brtan pa nyid kyis rdo rje sems dpa' ni rdo rje 'chang chen po sku yang dag 'jug ni thob par 'gyur te /
translated: Similarly, by the power of retention, which is firmness, Vajrasattva, that is, Mahāvajradhara, will enter the body and be attained.

original: 'dzin ba ni 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dzin ba ni 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because retention has the nature of clear light.

original: de bzhin du rjes su dran pa'i sbyor ba ni rjes su dran pa thob pas 'od kyi dkyil 'khor skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rjes su dran pa'i sbyor ba ni rjes su dran pa thob pas 'od kyi dkyil 'khor skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: Similarly, by the application of recollection, the arising of the maṇḍala of light will occur through the attainment of recollection.

original: rjes su dran pa'i spro ba'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su dran pa'i spro ba'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because recollection has the nature of emanation.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis 'od kyi tshogs zil gyis gnon cing 'dul bar mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis 'od kyi tshogs zil gyis gnon cing 'dul bar mdzad pa'o //
translated: And in omniscience, the deities of the mandala of light overcome and tame the mass of light.

original: ting 'dzin dbang gyur tsam gyis ni ting nge 'dzin brtan par gyur na'o //
analyzed: ting 'dzin dbang gyur tsam gyis ni ting nge 'dzin brtan par gyur na'o //
translated: By the mere mastery of samadhi, when samadhi becomes stable.

original: sgrib pa rnams dang bral bar 'gyur ba ni rnal 'byor ba brag pa med par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: sgrib pa rnams dang bral bar 'gyur ba ni rnal 'byor ba brag pa med par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Being free from obscurations means that the yogin becomes free from obstacles.

original: de ltar yan lag drug sgom par byed pa'i rnal 'byor ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba dang / rdo rje 'chang gi dbugs dbyung ba dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la sogs pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de ni rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: de ltar yan lag drug sgom par byed pa'i rnal 'byor ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba dang / rdo rje 'chang gi dbugs dbyung ba dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la sogs pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de ni rnal 'byor ro //
translated: Thus, the yogin who cultivates these six branches in this way attains the solace of the Tathagata, the solace of Vajradhara, and the attainment of the five superknowledges and so forth. This is yoga.

original: da ni thabs bzhi bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni thabs bzhi bshad par bya ste /
translated: Now, the four methods will be explained.

original: snying po de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: snying po de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The essence of that and so forth.

original: re zhig dang por rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa'i gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas stong pa nyid sgom pa sngon du 'gro bas ye shes gsum yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa'i zla ba'i steng du yi ge h'um las
analyzed: re zhig dang por rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa'i gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas stong pa nyid sgom pa sngon du 'gro bas ye shes gsum yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa'i zla ba'i steng du yi ge h'um las
translated: First, a yogi who possesses the yoga of any suitable deity, such as Great Vajradhara, having previously meditated on emptiness, imagines a vajra arisen from the letter hūṃ on a moon arisen from the complete transformation of the three seed syllables.

original: byung ba'i rdo rje bsam zhing de'i lte bar yi ge h'um dgod de de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs te mtshon cha dam pa ni rtse mo'i cha rno ba nam mkhar spro zhing des ji ltar 'dod pa'i lha mo'i 'khor lo bkug cing bcug ste /
analyzed: byung ba'i rdo rje bsam zhing de'i lte bar yi ge h'um dgod de de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs te mtshon cha dam pa ni rtse mo'i cha rno ba nam mkhar spro zhing des ji ltar 'dod pa'i lha mo'i 'khor lo bkug cing bcug ste /
translated: In its center he places the letter hūṃ, and from that light rays, that is, excellent weapons, emanate into space.

original: sems ni sems kyi rnam par lha'i tshogs sngags kyi ngo bor byas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin du bsams te yongs su gyur pa las sngags kyi sku'i sbyor ba ste /
analyzed: sems ni sems kyi rnam par lha'i tshogs sngags kyi ngo bor byas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin du bsams te yongs su gyur pa las sngags kyi sku'i sbyor ba ste /
translated: The mind, that is, the assembly of deities created from the mind, is made into the essence of the mantra circle, which is imagined to be the nature of all tathāgatas.🔽The complete transformation is the yoga of the mantra body.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi sku bskyed la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi sku bskyed la /
translated: The body that is the nature of all tathāgatas is generated.

original: byang chub tshigs bcad ni /🔽dpal ldan sangs rgyas sku @313a * //
analyzed: byang chub tshigs bcad ni / dpal ldan sangs rgyas sku @313a * //
translated: The verse on enlightenment is:

original: 'chang ba // zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba la sogs pa sku la sogs pas byin gyis brlab pa'i tshig dang sngags kyang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'chang ba // zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba la sogs pa sku la sogs pas byin gyis brlab pa'i tshig dang sngags kyang brjod par bya'o //
translated: The glorious Buddha, holding the body, and so forth, and the words and mantras for the consecration of body and so forth, such as Om, I am of the nature of the vajra body of all Tathagatas, and so forth.

original: gzhan yang rang gi dkyil 'khor ni dkyil 'khor pa'i tshogs spro zhing de'i dbus su gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas byang chub sbyor ba'i sgom pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang rang gi dkyil 'khor ni dkyil 'khor pa'i tshogs spro zhing de'i dbus su gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas byang chub sbyor ba'i sgom pa ste /
translated: Moreover, one's own mandala is the emanation of the assembly of the mandala, and the yogin who abides in the middle of that is the meditation of the application of enlightenment.

original: thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pa'i sbyor bas sems de ni dkyil 'khor pa'i dbus su gnas pa'i gtso bo'i sku /
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pa'i sbyor bas sems de ni dkyil 'khor pa'i dbus su gnas pa'i gtso bo'i sku /
translated: By the application of the union of means and insight, that mind is the body of the principal deity who abides in the middle of the mandala.

original: ye shes kyi gzugs de 'od du zhu zhing thig le yungs kar gyi 'bru'i tshad tsam bsgom par bya ba ste nye bar sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi gzugs de 'od du zhu zhing thig le yungs kar gyi 'bru'i tshad tsam bsgom par bya ba ste nye bar sgrub pa'o //
translated: That form of pristine consciousness melts into light and one should meditate on a drop the size of a mustard seed, which is the near attainment.

original: de ni dang po sbyor ba dang / dkyil 'khor rgyal po'i mchog dang / las kyi rgyal po mchog ste gsum pa'i thabs so //
analyzed: de ni dang po sbyor ba dang / dkyil 'khor rgyal po'i mchog dang / las kyi rgyal po mchog ste gsum pa'i thabs so //
translated: This is the method of the three: the first, the application, the supreme king of mandalas, and the supreme king of actions.

original: de ltar byas kyang rnal 'byor bas dngos grub thob par ma gyur na /
analyzed: de ltar byas kyang rnal 'byor bas dngos grub thob par ma gyur na /
translated: If, in spite of that, the adept does not attain power,

original: de'i tshe sbyin pa'i thabs brtsam par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i tshe sbyin pa'i thabs brtsam par bya ste /
translated: then at that time he should undertake the method of giving.🔽As long as, etc.

original: ji srid ces bya ba la sogs pa la rnam pa gnyis ni zla ba gnyis dang zla ba phyed gnyis dang / zla ba gcig dang zla ba phyed dang / zhag bdun dang / zhag drug gis dngos grub grub par ma gyur na /
analyzed: ji srid ces bya ba la sogs pa la rnam pa gnyis ni zla ba gnyis dang zla ba phyed gnyis dang / zla ba gcig dang zla ba phyed dang / zhag bdun dang / zhag drug gis dngos grub grub par ma gyur na /
translated: The two kinds are two months and two half months, one month and a half month, seven days, and six days. If power is not achieved,

original: de'i tshe sbyor ba nyid kyis gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i lha mo spros te /
analyzed: de'i tshe sbyor ba nyid kyis gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i lha mo spros te /
translated: then at that time, by means of the application itself, he should emanate the goddesses beginning with Rūpavajrā,

original: nam mkha'i khams la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rim pa 'dis mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rim pa 'dis mchod par bya'o //
translated: and make offerings to the Tathāgatas abiding in the realm of space by this process.

original: gzugs rdo rje ma spro zhing rnam pa lnga'i me tog gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la /
analyzed: gzugs rdo rje ma spro zhing rnam pa lnga'i me tog gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la /
translated: Emanating Rūpavajrā, with flowers of the five aspects, to the Tathāgatas,

original: aom badzra pushpa a'a:h'um zhes pas mchod do //
analyzed: aom badzra pushpa a'a:h'um zhes pas mchod do //
translated: One should worship with Om vajra-flower aḥ hūṃ.

original: de nas sgra rdo rje ma spros shing rol mo dbul bar bya ste /
analyzed: de nas sgra rdo rje ma spros shing rol mo dbul bar bya ste /
translated: Then, having emanated the sound-vajra woman, one should offer music.

original: aom sarbba ta tha' ga ta shapta p'u dza me gha sa mu dra pha ra na sa ma ya shri ye h'um zhes pas mchod do //
analyzed: aom sarbba ta tha' ga ta shapta p'u dza me gha sa mu dra pha ra na sa ma ya shri ye h'um zhes pas mchod do //
translated: One should worship with Om homage to all tathāgatas' sound-worship-great cloud-samaya-gem-adoration hūṃ.

original: de nas dri rdo rje ma spro zhing dung phor na gnas pa'i bzhi mnyam pa'i dris /
analyzed: de nas dri rdo rje ma spro zhing dung phor na gnas pa'i bzhi mnyam pa'i dris /
translated: Then, having emanated the smell-vajra woman, one should offer the smell of the four equal parts in a conch shell.

original: aom badzra gandhe a'a:h'um sv'ah'a zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das la byung pa bya'o //🔽ro rdo rje ma spro zhing snod la gnas pa'i bdud rtsi lnga spro zhing de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod cing de rnams kyis kyang zhes te /
analyzed: aom badzra gandhe a'a:h'um sv'ah'a zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das la byung pa bya'o // ro rdo rje ma spro zhing snod la gnas pa'i bdud rtsi lnga spro zhing de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod cing de rnams kyis kyang zhes te /
translated: One should worship the Bhagavān with Om vajra-smell aḥ hūṃ svāhā.

original: bde ba chen po dam pa'i dgongs pas spyod do //
analyzed: bde ba chen po dam pa'i dgongs pas spyod do //
translated: Having emanated the taste-vajra woman, one should offer the five nectars in a vessel, and worship the tathāgatas with them, and they also enjoy them with the intention of supreme bliss.

original: aom badzra aa mri ta a'a:h'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom badzra aa mri ta a'a:h'um sv'a h'a /
translated: Om vajra-amṛta aḥ hūṃ svāhā.

original: de nas reg bya rdo rje ma spro zhing rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i na bza' dbul bar bya ste /
analyzed: de nas reg bya rdo rje ma spro zhing rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i na bza' dbul bar bya ste /
translated: Then, having emanated the touch-vajra woman, one should offer various garments.

original: aom sab resha badzra a'a:h'um sv'a h'a zhes @313b brjod do //
analyzed: aom sab resha badzra a'a:h'um sv'a h'a zhes @313b brjod do //
translated: One should say, Om, I am the vajra of the space of phenomena.

original: de nas chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ma spro zhing 'khyud pa dang tsumba la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod cing /
analyzed: de nas chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ma spro zhing 'khyud pa dang tsumba la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod cing /
translated: Then, one should emanate the vajra of the space of phenomena, and with embrace, kissing, and so forth, one should worship the tathagatas.

original: aom sarbba ta tha' ga ta ya nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes brjod cing /
analyzed: aom sarbba ta tha' ga ta ya nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes brjod cing /
translated: One should say, Om, I am the nature of the vajra of the love of all tathagatas.

original: mchod pa'i mthar lha mo bsdu zhing mi bskyod rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bstod la /
analyzed: mchod pa'i mthar lha mo bsdu zhing mi bskyod rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bstod la /
translated: At the end of the worship, one should gather the goddesses and with the verses beginning Akṣobhya Vajra, one should praise the tathagatas.

original: de rnams dbang bskur ba thob nas rang gi rigs kyi bdag pos rgyas btab cing tshangs pa'i sgo nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs shing /
analyzed: de rnams dbang bskur ba thob nas rang gi rigs kyi bdag pos rgyas btab cing tshangs pa'i sgo nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs shing /
translated: Having obtained the consecration of those, one should be sealed by one's own clan lord, and with the Brahma face, one should remain with the tathagatas seated.🔽 One should say, Om, I am the nature of the vajra of the love of all tathagatas.

original: aom sarba ta tha' ga ta par ma no ba re ga te ta sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes brjod cing langs nas gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: aom sarba ta tha' ga ta par ma no ba re ga te ta sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes brjod cing langs nas gnas par bya'o //
translated: Having arisen, one should remain.

original: de'i tshe 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes dang po sbyor ba la sogs pa gsum dang sbyin pa'i thabs so //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes dang po sbyor ba la sogs pa gsum dang sbyin pa'i thabs so //
translated: Thus, the three, beginning with the first union, are the means of giving.

original: zla drug la sogs par de ltar byas na yang gal te 'grub bar mi 'gyur na de'i tshe dbye ba'i thabs brtsams par bya ste /
analyzed: zla drug la sogs par de ltar byas na yang gal te 'grub bar mi 'gyur na de'i tshe dbye ba'i thabs brtsams par bya ste /
translated: If one does it that way for six months and so forth, but it still is not accomplished, then one should undertake the means of separation.

original: gal te zla ba drug gis ma mthong ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis ji ltar bshad pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'i mtshan nyid kyi dngos grub mi stsol na //
analyzed: gal te zla ba drug gis ma mthong ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis ji ltar bshad pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'i mtshan nyid kyi dngos grub mi stsol na //
translated: If one does not see it within six months, then the buddhas will not grant the spiritual powers of the characteristics of Great Vajradhara, as explained.

original: lan gsum ni dam tshig sems dpa' dang ye shes sems dpa' dang ting nge 'dzin sems dpa'i dbye ba dang / ji ltar bshad pa'i bsrung ba la sogs pa'i dam tshig dang sdom pa spyod pa dang ldan pa sngar bshad pa'i sku'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas rang rang gi snying gar rdo rje rno ba bsams te /
analyzed: lan gsum ni dam tshig sems dpa' dang ye shes sems dpa' dang ting nge 'dzin sems dpa'i dbye ba dang / ji ltar bshad pa'i bsrung ba la sogs pa'i dam tshig dang sdom pa spyod pa dang ldan pa sngar bshad pa'i sku'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas rang rang gi snying gar rdo rje rno ba bsams te /
translated: Three times is the division of the commitment being, the gnosis being, and the concentration being, and it is endowed with the conduct of the commitments and vows, such as the protection, as explained. Endowed with the yoga of the body, as previously explained, one should imagine a sharp vajra at one's heart.

original: de'i h'um las byung ba'i 'od zer lcags kyu ngag gi lam nas phyung ste de yongs su gyur pa las gnod mdzes kyi rgyal po bsgoms te /
analyzed: de'i h'um las byung ba'i 'od zer lcags kyu ngag gi lam nas phyung ste de yongs su gyur pa las gnod mdzes kyi rgyal po bsgoms te /
translated: The light rays in the form of hooks that arise from that hūṃ are emitted from the path of the voice. Having meditated on the king of the harmful ones that arise from that transformation,

original: de la bka' bsgo zhing rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi shing rtas song zhing de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyan sngar phyin nas rdo rje tho bas de rnams kyi thugs dkar brdeg cing 'di skad brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de la bka' bsgo zhing rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi shing rtas song zhing de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyan sngar phyin nas rdo rje tho bas de rnams kyi thugs dkar brdeg cing 'di skad brjod par bya'o //
translated: one should order him, and having gone by the chariot of the wind mandala, having arrived in the presence of the tathāgatas, one should strike their hearts with the vajra hammer and say this:

original: che ge mo zhig rdo rje che //
analyzed: che ge mo zhig rdo rje che //
translated: “So and so is the great vajra.

original: khyed rnams kyis ni brtan par gnas //
analyzed: khyed rnams kyis ni brtan par gnas //
translated: You all are firmly abiding.

original: rtag tu khyed la dad pa can //
analyzed: rtag tu khyed la dad pa can //
translated: Always faithful to you,

original: dam tshig bsrung ba la brtson pa //
analyzed: dam tshig bsrung ba la brtson pa //
translated: striving to guard the commitments,

original: dbang bskur ba dang rjes gnang thob //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba dang rjes gnang thob //
translated: having obtained the empowerment and subsequent authorization,

original: de la dngos grub stsol bar mdzod //
analyzed: de la dngos grub stsol bar mdzod //
translated: grant spiritual powers to him.”

original: ces bya ba brjod pas zhag bdun gyis dngos grub ster bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ces bya ba brjod pas zhag bdun gyis dngos grub ster bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By saying this, the spiritual powers will be granted in seven days.

original: ting nge 'dzin gsum dang dbye ba'i thabs so //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gsum dang dbye ba'i thabs so //
translated: This is the method of the three meditative stabilizations and the separation.

original: de ltar byas na yang gal te 'grub par mi 'gyur na de'i tshe @314a * //
analyzed: de ltar byas na yang gal te 'grub par mi 'gyur na de'i tshe @314a * //
translated: If one does so, but it still does not succeed, then at that time🔽one should begin the application of the fierce one.

original: chad pa'i sbyor ba brtsam par gang tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: chad pa'i sbyor ba brtsam par gang tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: As for “when,” etc.,

original: gang gi tshe byang chub ni rdo rje 'chang nyid ma grub ste thob par ma gyur na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe byang chub ni rdo rje 'chang nyid ma grub ste thob par ma gyur na /
translated: when awakening, that is, Vajradhara, is not accomplished, that is, not attained,

original: de'i tshe drag shul sbyor ni chad pa'i thabs kyi sbyor bas bsgrub par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i tshe drag shul sbyor ni chad pa'i thabs kyi sbyor bas bsgrub par bya ste /
translated: then at that time one should accomplish it by the application of the fierce one, that is, the application of the method of severing.

original: de'i tshe de'i ye shes 'grub pa ni nges par dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe de'i ye shes 'grub pa ni nges par dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: At that time, the accomplishment of the gnosis is the definite arising of the powers.

original: de la rim pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la rim pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The stages of that are as follows.

original: m'a ma k'i la sogs pa'i padmar ha las byung ba'i sna tshogs 'od zer h'um las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms te /
analyzed: m'a ma k'i la sogs pa'i padmar ha las byung ba'i sna tshogs 'od zer h'um las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms te /
translated: One should meditate on the maṇḍala arisen from hūṃ in the lotus of Māmakī, etc., which is arisen from hūṃ.

original: de'i steng du ram las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge phat dgod cing rang gi gsang ba'i rdo rjer yang bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba dang 'dra bar bsams te /
analyzed: de'i steng du ram las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge phat dgod cing rang gi gsang ba'i rdo rjer yang bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba dang 'dra bar bsams te /
translated: Above that, on the fire maṇḍala arisen from raṃ, one should visualize the syllable phaṭ, and one should imagine that one’s secret vajra blazes like the fire at the end of the eon.

original: ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon las byung ba'i sna tshogs 'od zer gyi sgo nas de bzhin gshegs pa bkug cing rigs kyi dbye ba ni rigs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i khro bo'i gzugs kyis ye shes kyi lha mo'i padmar bcug la rdo rje'i phur bus btab ste🔽dbang du byas pa de dang lhan cig bdag nyid tha mi dad par bsgoms la /
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon las byung ba'i sna tshogs 'od zer gyi sgo nas de bzhin gshegs pa bkug cing rigs kyi dbye ba ni rigs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i khro bo'i gzugs kyis ye shes kyi lha mo'i padmar bcug la rdo rje'i phur bus btab ste dbang du byas pa de dang lhan cig bdag nyid tha mi dad par bsgoms la /
translated: Having summoned the Tathagatas by means of the light rays of the seed syllable of the wisdom being, one should place them in the lotus of the wisdom goddess in the form of a wrathful being who follows the type of the Tathagata, and nail them down with the vajra dagger.

original: khro bo'i 'khor lo phyi rol du spro zhing rang gi lha'i sku la bsrung bar bya'o //
analyzed: khro bo'i 'khor lo phyi rol du spro zhing rang gi lha'i sku la bsrung bar bya'o //
translated: Having meditated on oneself as inseparable from them, one should emanate the wheel of wrathful beings outside and protect one's deity's body.

original: de ting nge 'dzin gsum dang chad pa'i thabs te bsgrub pa'i phyogs gcig go //
analyzed: de ting nge 'dzin gsum dang chad pa'i thabs te bsgrub pa'i phyogs gcig go //
translated: This is the method of the three samadhis and the means of cutting off, one part of the practice.

original: de la don bsdus pa 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la don bsdus pa 'di yin te /
translated: Here is the summary of the meaning:

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ltar mi slu bar gsungs te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ltar mi slu bar gsungs te /
translated: The Blessed One has said this without deception.

original: yid ches pa dang sdom pa la gnas pa lha'i sku brtson pa la bskyed pa lha rnams kyi rjes su gnang bas gang gi tshe zla ba drug dang zla ba gnyis dang gcig dang zla ba phyed kyis 'grub par mi 'gyur na de'i tshe zhag bdun gyis bsgrub
analyzed: yid ches pa dang sdom pa la gnas pa lha'i sku brtson pa la bskyed pa lha rnams kyi rjes su gnang bas gang gi tshe zla ba drug dang zla ba gnyis dang gcig dang zla ba phyed kyis 'grub par mi 'gyur na de'i tshe zhag bdun gyis bsgrub
translated: If one does not achieve it in six months, two months, one month, or half a month, then one should achieve it in seven days.🔽

original: pa brtsams par bya ste /
analyzed: pa brtsams par bya ste /
translated: If one does not achieve it in six months, two months, one month, or half a month, then one should commence the practice for seven days.

original: sa bon bhr'um las byung ba'i gzhal yas khang pa'i nang du bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus la gnas rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa gang yang rung brjod pa rdo rje rigs kyi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas rang gi ba spu dag nas byung ba lha
analyzed: sa bon bhr'um las byung ba'i gzhal yas khang pa'i nang du bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus la gnas rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa gang yang rung brjod pa rdo rje rigs kyi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas rang gi ba spu dag nas byung ba lha
translated: In the interior of the celestial mansion arisen from the seed syllable bhrūṃ, in the center of the mandala array, one who is endowed with the yoga of the vajra family, any of the deities such as Great Vajradhara, and so on, should visualize the assembly of goddesses arisen from one’s pores.

original: mo'i tshogs kyis mngon par dga' ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bzhugs pa'i ye shes kyi lha la bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod la /
analyzed: mo'i tshogs kyis mngon par dga' ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bzhugs pa'i ye shes kyi lha la bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod la /
translated: One should make offerings to the gnosis deities residing in the buddhafield of Manifest Joy with unsurpassed offerings.

original: de rnams kyis kyang snyan ba dang / yid du 'ong ba'i tshig gis gsol ba btab cing spyan drangs te /
analyzed: de rnams kyis kyang snyan ba dang / yid du 'ong ba'i tshig gis gsol ba btab cing spyan drangs te /
translated: They also supplicate with pleasing and agreeable words and invite him.

original: rang gi lus la zhugs shing de dang lhan cig tu tha mi dad par @314b bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi lus la zhugs shing de dang lhan cig tu tha mi dad par @314b bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
translated: He enters one's body and one should meditate on oneself as non-different from him.

original: de'i tshe zhag bdun gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro //🔽de ltar byas kyang 'grub par 'gyur na de'i tshe rang gi ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka la gnas pa'i padma dang zla ba rdo rje'i chang zungs kyi h'um las byung ba'i gnod mdzes kyi rgyal po dang 'dra ba sa bon gsum gyis brlabs pa /
analyzed: de'i tshe zhag bdun gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro // de ltar byas kyang 'grub par 'gyur na de'i tshe rang gi ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka la gnas pa'i padma dang zla ba rdo rje'i chang zungs kyi h'um las byung ba'i gnod mdzes kyi rgyal po dang 'dra ba sa bon gsum gyis brlabs pa /
translated: At that time, one will be successful in seven days.🔽If one is not successful even though one does it in that way, then one should meditate on oneself as Akṣobhya, and at the heart of one's gnosis-being, on a lotus and moon, from the syllable hūṃ in the whorl of a vajra, one should generate Sumbharāja, who is similar to oneself, but marked with the three seed syllables.

original: rdo rje lcags kyu rang gi kha nas phyung zhing de yongs su gyur ba las gnod mdzes kyi rgyal po yam las byung ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du ram las byung ba gru gsum gyi shing rta la gnas par byas la bskal pa'i me dang nyin
analyzed: rdo rje lcags kyu rang gi kha nas phyung zhing de yongs su gyur ba las gnod mdzes kyi rgyal po yam las byung ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du ram las byung ba gru gsum gyi shing rta la gnas par byas la bskal pa'i me dang nyin
translated: One should draw out a vajra hook from one's mouth, and from its transformation, Sumbharāja, who arises from the syllable yaṃ on a wind mandala, and who is situated on a triangular vehicle arisen from the syllable raṃ, should be made to blaze with the fire of the eon and the sun and moon.

original: ma ltar 'bar ba bka' bsgo bar bya zhing gtang bar bya'o ;
analyzed: ma ltar 'bar ba bka' bsgo bar bya zhing gtang bar bya'o ;
translated: One should command the blazing one like a mother and release it.

original: / de song zhing ye shes sems dpa' de nyid kyi thugs 'bar ba tho bas brdeg cing /
analyzed: / de song zhing ye shes sems dpa' de nyid kyi thugs 'bar ba tho bas brdeg cing /
translated: That one goes and strikes the heart of the gnosis being with a blazing hammer.

original: che ge mo zhig rdo rje che //
analyzed: che ge mo zhig rdo rje che //
translated: “So and so is the great vajra.

original: khyed rnams kyis ni brtan par gnas //
analyzed: khyed rnams kyis ni brtan par gnas //
translated: You all abide firmly.

original: khyed la rtag tu dad pa can //
analyzed: khyed la rtag tu dad pa can //
translated: You are always faithful.

original: dam tshig bsrung ba la brtson pa //
analyzed: dam tshig bsrung ba la brtson pa //
translated: You are diligent in guarding the commitments.

original: dbang bskur ba dang rjes gnang thob //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba dang rjes gnang thob //
translated: You have obtained initiation and subsequent authorization.

original: de la dngos grub stsol bar mdzod //
analyzed: de la dngos grub stsol bar mdzod //
translated: Grant spiritual powers to that one.”

original: ces brjod cing ldog par bsams te /
analyzed: ces brjod cing ldog par bsams te /
translated: Saying this, one imagines that the gnosis being is turned back.

original: de lta na zhag bdun gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na zhag bdun gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: If that is the case, it will be accomplished in seven days.

original: de lta yin na yang gal te dngos grub mi stsol na de'i tshe rig ma'i padma'i nang du ha las byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje /
analyzed: de lta yin na yang gal te dngos grub mi stsol na de'i tshe rig ma'i padma'i nang du ha las byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje /
translated: If that is the case, but it does not grant spiritual powers, then one should imagine a vajra cross arisen from hūṃ in the lotus of the knowledge woman,

original: de'i lta bar h'um las skyes pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nyi ma bye ba dang mtshungs pa bsams te /
analyzed: de'i lta bar h'um las skyes pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nyi ma bye ba dang mtshungs pa bsams te /
translated: and in its center a sun maṇḍala arisen from hūṃ, equal to ten million suns.

original: de'i steng du yi ge phat dang yi ge ram yongs su gyur nas bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba gru gsum bsams te /
analyzed: de'i steng du yi ge phat dang yi ge ram yongs su gyur nas bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba gru gsum bsams te /
translated: On top of that, having transformed the syllable phaṭ and the syllable raṃ, one should imagine a blazing fire like the fire at the end of the eon, triangular.

original: gsang ba'i rdo rje snga ma bzhin du 'bar bar bsams la de bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyu yang spor zhing brtan la /
analyzed: gsang ba'i rdo rje snga ma bzhin du 'bar bar bsams la de bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyu yang spor zhing brtan la /
translated: One should imagine the secret vajra blazing as before, and likewise, one should wave the vajra hook and be firm.

original: des ye shes kyi lha'i thugs kar 'bigs shing 'gugs pa dang zhugs shing lha mo'i padma'i gnas su me long gi dkyil 'khor du gzhug go //
analyzed: des ye shes kyi lha'i thugs kar 'bigs shing 'gugs pa dang zhugs shing lha mo'i padma'i gnas su me long gi dkyil 'khor du gzhug go //
translated: With that, one should pierce the heart of the gnosis deity, and one should draw it in and place it in the mirror mandala of the lotus abode of the goddess.

original: gsang ba'i rdo rje de yang me'i 'od spro ba padma la zhugs te /
analyzed: gsang ba'i rdo rje de yang me'i 'od spro ba padma la zhugs te /
translated: That secret vajra, emitting the light of fire, enters the lotus.

original: rig ma'i khar bcug pa'i sngags kyi phreng ba de de'i spyi bor bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba phab par bsam mo //
analyzed: rig ma'i khar bcug pa'i sngags kyi phreng ba de de'i spyi bor bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba phab par bsam mo //
translated: One should imagine that the mantra rosary placed in the mouth of the knowledge consort is brought down on her crown, blazing like the fire at the end of the eon.

original: de dag thams cad kyis ni thal bar 'gyur bar bsams te /
analyzed: de dag thams cad kyis ni thal bar 'gyur bar bsams te /
translated: One should imagine that all of that is reduced to ashes.

original: de'i shes pa mar me dang mtshungs pa yi ge h'um gi gzugs can yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje 'chang gi sku bsgoms te /
analyzed: de'i shes pa mar me dang mtshungs pa yi ge h'um gi gzugs can yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje 'chang gi sku bsgoms te /
translated: One’s consciousness, like a lamp, having transformed into the form of the syllable hūṃ, one should meditate on the form of Vajradhara.

original: rang gi lus la zhugs shing de dang lhan cig dbyer med par bdag nyid bsgoms na zhag @315a * //
analyzed: rang gi lus la zhugs shing de dang lhan cig dbyer med par bdag nyid bsgoms na zhag @315a * //
translated: If one meditates on oneself as inseparable from that,

original: bdun nyid kyis gsang ba'i dam tshig ldang ba'i rig par nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdun nyid kyis gsang ba'i dam tshig ldang ba'i rig par nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: in seven days one will certainly accomplish the knowledge of rising from the secret pledge.

original: rnam pa bzhi po de dag gis rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du sdum pa dang / sbyin pa /
analyzed: rnam pa bzhi po de dag gis rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du sdum pa dang / sbyin pa /
translated: By these four aspects, one should understand the stages of reconciliation, giving,

original: dbye ba dang / chad pa'i rim pa shes par bya'o //
analyzed: dbye ba dang / chad pa'i rim pa shes par bya'o //
translated: division, and punishment, respectively.

original: de ni bsgrub pa'i phyogs gcig go //
analyzed: de ni bsgrub pa'i phyogs gcig go //
translated: This is one part of the practice.

original: 'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin bshad par bya ste /
translated: Now, the meditative stabilization by the method of great passion will be explained.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas rang gi rig ma dang snyoms par 'jug cing mchog tu chags pa'i sgras ye shes kyi 'khor lo dgug cing rang gi lus la bcug ste /
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas rang gi rig ma dang snyoms par 'jug cing mchog tu chags pa'i sgras ye shes kyi 'khor lo dgug cing rang gi lus la bcug ste /
translated: A yogin of Great Vajradhara and so forth enters into union with his knowledge consort and with the sound of supreme passion he invites the wheel of exalted wisdom and causes it to enter his body.

original: spyan ma nas brtsams te reg bya rdo rje ma'i bar du lha mo dgu'i tshul du spros te /
analyzed: spyan ma nas brtsams te reg bya rdo rje ma'i bar du lha mo dgu'i tshul du spros te /
translated: He emanates the nine goddesses beginning with Lochana and ending with Sparshavajra.

original: des ni 'dod chags kyi spyod pa dang ldan pa'i sems can gyi don byas la dgug cing bsgrub bya ni rang gi rig ma'i sku la zhugs te /
analyzed: des ni 'dod chags kyi spyod pa dang ldan pa'i sems can gyi don byas la dgug cing bsgrub bya ni rang gi rig ma'i sku la zhugs te /
translated: Having thus acted for the sake of sentient beings who are endowed with the practice of passion, one should summon the victim and cause him to enter the body of one's knowledge woman.

original: yang spyan la sogs pa phyag rgya bzhi spro zhing phyogs bzhi la gnas pa'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su lnga'i bdag nyid bsams te /
analyzed: yang spyan la sogs pa phyag rgya bzhi spro zhing phyogs bzhi la gnas pa'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su lnga'i bdag nyid bsams te /
translated: Again, one should emit the four seals such as Locana and so forth, and imagine the fivefold nature in the center of the seal mandala situated in the four directions.

original: 'khor lo can thams cad bsdu zhing lnga'i bdag nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes shing /
analyzed: 'khor lo can thams cad bsdu zhing lnga'i bdag nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes shing /
translated: One should gather all the wheel-holders, and please the Tathagatas of the fivefold nature.

original: sngags thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi rnal 'byor pas mchog tu dga' ba'i dus su mi gsung bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: sngags thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi rnal 'byor pas mchog tu dga' ba'i dus su mi gsung bar 'gyur zhing /
translated: The yogi who is the nature of all mantras will become silent at the time of supreme joy.

original: de'i tshe byang chub ni 'od gsal ba'i de kho na nyid bsgoms pa ni zhugs shing thim par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe byang chub ni 'od gsal ba'i de kho na nyid bsgoms pa ni zhugs shing thim par bya'o //
translated: At that time, enlightenment is the meditation on the reality of clear light, and one should enter and dissolve into it.

original: de nas khyod ni rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pos bskul zhing sad nas sems can gyi don bya'o //
analyzed: de nas khyod ni rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pos bskul zhing sad nas sems can gyi don bya'o //
translated: Then, having been aroused and awakened by the four verses beginning with You are Vajrasattva, one should act for the sake of sentient beings.

original: de ni dang po sbyor ba dang dkyil 'khor rgyal po dang las kyi rgyal po mchog go //
analyzed: de ni dang po sbyor ba dang dkyil 'khor rgyal po dang las kyi rgyal po mchog go //
translated: This is the supreme first application, mandala king, and action king.

original: nang gi bdag nyid kyi rim pas dbang bskur ba bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: nang gi bdag nyid kyi rim pas dbang bskur ba bshad par bya ste /
translated: The consecration of the inner nature should be explained.

original: dus gsum rdo rje ni dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
analyzed: dus gsum rdo rje ni dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
translated: The vajra of the three times is the Tathagatas of the three times.

original: de'i rang bzhin ni de'i ngo bo ste /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin ni de'i ngo bo ste /
translated: Their nature is their essence.

original: ye shes ni de'i bdag nyid kyi ye shes bsdus par bsams la /
analyzed: ye shes ni de'i bdag nyid kyi ye shes bsdus par bsams la /
translated: The wisdom is the wisdom of their nature.

original: de bzhin du ni dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa bzhin du lus ni lus kyang bsgom par bya'o ;
analyzed: de bzhin du ni dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa bzhin du lus ni lus kyang bsgom par bya'o ;
translated: The body is the body of the three times, like the Tathagatas of the three times.

original: / de nas dus gsum pa'i de bzhin pa'i rig ma'i padmar zhugs te /
analyzed: / de nas dus gsum pa'i de bzhin pa'i rig ma'i padmar zhugs te /
translated: Then, the Tathagatas of the three times enter the lotus of the knowledge consort.

original: kha dog de nyid ni rdo rje 'chang chen po 'dra ba'i kha dog ste dkar po'o //
analyzed: kha dog de nyid ni rdo rje 'chang chen po 'dra ba'i kha dog ste dkar po'o //
translated: The color is the color like Great Vajradhara, which is white.

original: thugs ka nas phyung zhing ro ni byang chub kyi sems te /
analyzed: thugs ka nas phyung zhing ro ni byang chub kyi sems te /
translated: The taste is the bodhicitta that is emitted from the heart.

original: rdo rje'i lam nas spro zhing rang gi rgyu ni rig ma'i padma'i nang du dbang bskur @315b bar bya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje'i lam nas spro zhing rang gi rgyu ni rig ma'i padma'i nang du dbang bskur @315b bar bya ste /
translated: The self-cause is the consecration in the lotus of the knowledge consort.

original: phye ba ni bsgrub par bya ba 'bras bu ni rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phye ba ni bsgrub par bya ba 'bras bu ni rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The division is for the sake of attaining the result, which is to be accomplished, namely, the state of Great Vajradhara.

original: de nas gzhan gyi don gyis byed par 'dod pas sngags ni phyung ba'i sngags te /
analyzed: de nas gzhan gyi don gyis byed par 'dod pas sngags ni phyung ba'i sngags te /
translated: Then, one who wishes to perform the benefit of others should emit the mantras, which are the mantras that are emitted.

original: rang rang gi sngags so //
analyzed: rang rang gi sngags so //
translated: They are one's own individual mantras.

original: chos ni zhal gsum pa lta bu la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: chos ni zhal gsum pa lta bu la sogs pa'o //
translated: The Dharma is the three-faced one, etc.

original: dbye bar gyur ba ni spro bar bya ste /
analyzed: dbye bar gyur ba ni spro bar bya ste /
translated: The division is the emanation.

original: rigs ni las kyi phyag rgya ma'am /
analyzed: rigs ni las kyi phyag rgya ma'am /
translated: The family is the karma consort or the wisdom consort.

original: chos kyi phyag rgya ni ye shes kyi padma'i nang nas spor bar bya'o //
analyzed: chos kyi phyag rgya ni ye shes kyi padma'i nang nas spor bar bya'o //
translated: One should emanate from the lotus of wisdom.

original: de dang yin zhe na 'khor los sgyur ba drug gtsug tor te /
analyzed: de dang yin zhe na 'khor los sgyur ba drug gtsug tor te /
translated: What is that? The six cakravartins are the uṣṇīṣas.

original: 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa'o //
translated: They are the kings of desire, etc.

original: rig pa'i rgyal mo ni gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rig pa'i rgyal mo ni gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'o //
translated: The vidyārājñīs are Rūpavajrā, etc.

original: rdzu 'phrul che ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul che ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'o //
translated: The great ṛddhis are the five tathāgatas.

original: 'khor los sgyur ba ni gtsug tor te /
analyzed: 'khor los sgyur ba ni gtsug tor te /
translated: The cakravartins are the uṣṇīṣas.

original: 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa'o //
translated: They are the kings of desire, etc.

original: 'dod pa kun ni gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa kun ni gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'o //
translated: All desires are Yamāntaka, etc.

original: rdo rje bdag po ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams te /
analyzed: rdo rje bdag po ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams te /
translated: The lords of the vajra are the bodhisattvas.

original: de dag spro zhing le'u bcu bdun pa las gsungs pa'i bsam gtan gyi 'khor lo ste /
analyzed: de dag spro zhing le'u bcu bdun pa las gsungs pa'i bsam gtan gyi 'khor lo ste /
translated: They are the wheel of meditative concentration taught in the seventeenth chapter.

original: nang gi bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba ni rig pa'i dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: nang gi bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba ni rig pa'i dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: The consecration in the inner mandala is the consecration of knowledge.

original: cho ga'i sbyor ba ni bsam gtan gyi sbyor bas so //
analyzed: cho ga'i sbyor ba ni bsam gtan gyi sbyor bas so //
translated: The yoga of the rite is the yoga of meditative concentration.

original: ye shes ni mchog tu dga' ba'i ye shes dang chags pa'i rnal 'byor pas sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni rig ma'i padma'i dkyil 'khor pa rnams dang gnyis su med par byed pa ni ro gcig par byed pa ni sgrub pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ye shes ni mchog tu dga' ba'i ye shes dang chags pa'i rnal 'byor pas sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni rig ma'i padma'i dkyil 'khor pa rnams dang gnyis su med par byed pa ni ro gcig par byed pa ni sgrub pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The knowledge is the knowledge of supreme joy. The yoga of passion is the vajra of body, speech, and mind, which is made nondual with the mandala of the knowledge consort's lotus. Making them one taste is called “accomplishment.”

original: gzhan yang sngar bshad pa'i rim gyis ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang sngar bshad pa'i rim gyis ni /
translated: Moreover, by the process explained previously,

original: rig ba'i skyes bu rdo rje can ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang snyoms par 'jug pa rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnal 'byor pas rig ma'i padma'i dkyil 'khor de nyid las bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du spros la /
analyzed: rig ba'i skyes bu rdo rje can ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang snyoms par 'jug pa rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnal 'byor pas rig ma'i padma'i dkyil 'khor de nyid las bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du spros la /
translated: The person of knowledge, the vajra holder, the yogin of the great Vajradhara in union with the gnosis consort, emanates his own mandala from that very mandala of the lotus of the knowledge consort, outside of himself.

original: de rnams kyis 'gro ba sbyangs te /
analyzed: de rnams kyis 'gro ba sbyangs te /
translated: Those purify migrating beings.

original: yang zhal gsum pa la sogs pa lta bu shar phyogs la sogs par rim gyis zhugs te /
analyzed: yang zhal gsum pa la sogs pa lta bu shar phyogs la sogs par rim gyis zhugs te /
translated: Again, like the three-faced one, and so on, they enter in stages in the east, and so on,

original: dkyil 'khor chen por bsgom par bya'o zhes pa sgrub pa chen por bshad do //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen por bsgom par bya'o zhes pa sgrub pa chen por bshad do //
translated: and one should meditate on the great mandala. This is explained as the great accomplishment.

original: dkyil 'khor la thig gdab pa'i chog bshad par bya ste ;
analyzed: dkyil 'khor la thig gdab pa'i chog bshad par bya ste ;
translated: The procedure for laying out the lines of the mandala should be explained.

original: sa gzung ba ni bsnyen pa'i dus te /
analyzed: sa gzung ba ni bsnyen pa'i dus te /
translated: The seizing of the ground is the time of the approach.

original: de la gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: de la gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs bsgom par bya ste /
translated: There one should meditate on the form of Uṣṇīṣa Cakravartin,

original: thams cad du dbang byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad du dbang byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because he has power over everything.

original: de nas sa brko zhing gang bar byas la zug rdu'i skyon thams cad gdon par mi nus na de'i tshe nye bar bsgrub pa'i dus te @316a * //
analyzed: de nas sa brko zhing gang bar byas la zug rdu'i skyon thams cad gdon par mi nus na de'i tshe nye bar bsgrub pa'i dus te @316a * //
translated: Then, having dug up the ground and filled it, if one is unable to remove all the faults of the ground, then that is the time for the near preparation.

original: sa spyong ba'i dus na bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i gzugs su bsams la /
analyzed: sa spyong ba'i dus na bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i gzugs su bsams la /
translated: At the time of purifying the ground, one should imagine oneself in the form of Amṛtakuṇḍali.

original: aom aa mri ta kunda li a'a:h'um phat ces bya ba'i sngags kyis sa'i dbus su lag pa btab na stobs dang ldan pas sbyang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: aom aa mri ta kunda li a'a:h'um phat ces bya ba'i sngags kyis sa'i dbus su lag pa btab na stobs dang ldan pas sbyang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one strikes the center of the ground with one's hand, reciting the mantra Oṃ amṛta kuṇḍali āḥ hūṃ phaṭ, one will purify with power.

original: de nas sgrub pa ni dkyil 'khor bri ba'i dus su sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas rang gi bdag nyid ni rang gi lha'i sbyor ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa lha'i sku bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas sgrub pa ni dkyil 'khor bri ba'i dus su sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas rang gi bdag nyid ni rang gi lha'i sbyor ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa lha'i sku bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Then, with regard to the practice, at the time of drawing the maṇḍala, the practitioner who wishes to draw the maṇḍala of Body-vajra and so forth should imagine oneself as the body of the deity such as Vairocana and so forth, by the yoga of one's own deity.

original: sgrub pa chen po'i dus ni thig btab pa'i dus /
analyzed: sgrub pa chen po'i dus ni thig btab pa'i dus /
translated: The time of the great practice is the time of laying out the lines.

original: de la sku ni slob ma dang bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang / sangs rgyas bdag po ni sku'i dkyil 'khor la ltos la 'od dpag tu med pa'am /
analyzed: de la sku ni slob ma dang bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang / sangs rgyas bdag po ni sku'i dkyil 'khor la ltos la 'od dpag tu med pa'am /
translated: The body is the disciples and Amṛtakuṇḍali, and the lord of the buddhas is Amitābha, in dependence on the body maṇḍala.🔽

original: mi bskyod pa'i gzugs su bsgoms /🔽gsung dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la ltos te rnam par snang mdzad dam mi bskyod pa'am 'od dpag tu med pa'am /
analyzed: mi bskyod pa'i gzugs su bsgoms / gsung dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la ltos te rnam par snang mdzad dam mi bskyod pa'am 'od dpag tu med pa'am /
translated: The body is the disciple and Amṛtakuṇḍali, and the lord of the buddhas is visualized in the form of Amitābha or Akṣobhya, depending on the body maṇḍala.

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs su bsgoms te /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs su bsgoms te /
translated: The speech and mind maṇḍalas are visualized as Vairocana, Akṣobhya, or Amitābha, depending on the maṇḍala.

original: khyab bdag ni rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: khyab bdag ni rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The all-pervading lord is visualized as Vajrasattva.

original: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad ni rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyis gsang ba ste /
analyzed: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad ni rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyis gsang ba ste /
translated: This is the secret of all buddhas, all yogis.

original: bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa la bstan par mi bya'o //
analyzed: bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa la bstan par mi bya'o //
translated: It should not be taught to the yogis of action tantra and so on.

original: mchog ni dam pa'i rnal 'byor ba ste /
analyzed: mchog ni dam pa'i rnal 'byor ba ste /
translated: The supreme is the excellent yogi.

original: sgrub pa po rnams kyi yin no zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: sgrub pa po rnams kyi yin no zhes pa'i don to //
translated: It is for the practitioners.

original: de ltar phye ba na bsnyen pa la sogs pa'i dbye ba shes shing rtogs nas /
analyzed: de ltar phye ba na bsnyen pa la sogs pa'i dbye ba shes shing rtogs nas /
translated: Thus, having understood the divisions of the approach and so on,

original: dngos grub ni rnam pa gnyis kyi dngos grub bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos grub ni rnam pa gnyis kyi dngos grub bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: One should accomplish the two kinds of powers.

original: gzhan du na bskal pa bye bas kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na bskal pa bye bas kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, one will not succeed even in ten million eons.

original: mchog ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: mchog ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
translated: The supreme is supramundane.

original: zhi ba ni thun mong ma yin pa'o //🔽sangs rgyas ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang skyob pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen te /
analyzed: zhi ba ni thun mong ma yin pa'o // sangs rgyas ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang skyob pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen te /
translated: The peaceful is not common.🔽Even the buddhas, the tathāgatas, and the protectors, Mahāvajradhara, will not succeed.

original: de rnams kyis kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bas ni phul du byung ba'i tshig ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyis kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bas ni phul du byung ba'i tshig ste /
translated: This is a superlative statement.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: This is the creation stage.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i bsnyen pa la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i bsnyen pa la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
translated: Now the approximation, etc., of the completion stage should be explained.

original: bsgrub bya dang sgrub pa ni shes rab dang thabs so //
analyzed: bsgrub bya dang sgrub pa ni shes rab dang thabs so //
translated: The object of attainment and the means of attainment are wisdom and method.

original: de dag sbyor ba ni tsumba na dang a'a lingga na dang / na kha du sha na dang btab pa'i mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: de dag sbyor ba ni tsumba na dang a'a lingga na dang / na kha du sha na dang btab pa'i mtshan nyid de /
translated: Their union is characterized by cumbana, āliṅgana, and nakhadamṣṭra.

original: phyi rol gyi bya ba ni bsnyen par bshad do //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi bya ba ni bsnyen par bshad do //
translated: External activity is explained as approximation.

original: snga ma bzhin du sngags las bskyed pa sngon du 'gro bas rdo rje dang padmar mnyam par sbyar ba ni nye bar sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du sngags las bskyed pa sngon du 'gro bas rdo rje dang padmar mnyam par sbyar ba ni nye bar sgrub pa'o //
translated: As before, the creation from the mantra precedes. The union of the vajra and lotus is the near attainment.

original: sa bon gyi byin gyis brlabs pas de dag gi sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: sa bon gyi byin gyis brlabs pas de dag gi sgrub pa'o //
translated: The consecration of the seed is their attainment.

original: rang rig @316b pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba bde ba chen po nyams su myong ba ni sgrub pa chen po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rang rig @316b pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba bde ba chen po nyams su myong ba ni sgrub pa chen po zhes bya'o //
translated: The experience of one’s own awareness, the natural luminosity, the great bliss, is the great attainment.

original: de nyid thabs las byung ba ma yin no zhes bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid thabs las byung ba ma yin no zhes bstan par bya'o //
translated: That itself is not arisen from a method.

original: ye shes de nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: ye shes de nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: That very wisdom is the lord of all buddhas, the Great Vajradhara.

original: dpal ldan ni bsod nams dang ye shes dang ldan pa ste ;
analyzed: dpal ldan ni bsod nams dang ye shes dang ldan pa ste ;
translated: Glorious means endowed with merit and wisdom.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i gnas so //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i gnas so //
translated: It is the abode of the Great Vajradhara.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga ste /
translated: All buddhas are the five tathagatas.

original: de dag thob par bya ba'i phyir thabs ni rgyu yin la /
analyzed: de dag thob par bya ba'i phyir thabs ni rgyu yin la /
translated: The method for attaining them is the cause.

original: 'di ni thabs las byung ba ste /
analyzed: 'di ni thabs las byung ba ste /
translated: This is arisen from the method.

original: de nyid kyi phyir chos rnams ni dngos po rnams kyi de nyid chos nyid de /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir chos rnams ni dngos po rnams kyi de nyid chos nyid de /
translated: Therefore, the reality of things is the reality of phenomena.

original: rang bzhin dang de nyid ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rang bzhin dang de nyid ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is a synonym for nature and reality.

original: rab tu byed pa las kyang /
analyzed: rab tu byed pa las kyang /
translated: And in the treatise,

original: 'di na rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: 'di na rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
translated: Here, the perfect yogi

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'ang de //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'ang de //
translated: is also the great vajra-holder.

original: rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i //
analyzed: rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i //
translated: Endowed with the most excellent of all aspects,

original: thams cad mkhyen pa de nas 'gyur //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa de nas 'gyur //
translated: he becomes omniscient.

original: 'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs dang // da ltar byung ba'i srid gsum ni //
analyzed: 'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs dang // da ltar byung ba'i srid gsum ni //
translated: The three existences of the past, future, and present

original: 'od gsal pas ni rnam dag pas //
analyzed: 'od gsal pas ni rnam dag pas //
translated: are completely purified by luminosity.

original: skad cig de la ma lus mthong //
analyzed: skad cig de la ma lus mthong //
translated: In that moment, he sees everything without exception.

original: zhes bshad do //
analyzed: zhes bshad do //
translated: This is explained.

original: de ni rang bzhin dang rgyu dang las dang 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: de ni rang bzhin dang rgyu dang las dang 'bras bu'o //
translated: This is the nature, cause, effect, and action.

original: da ni las kyi tshogs 'dri ba'i lan bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni las kyi tshogs 'dri ba'i lan bshad par bya ste /
translated: Now, the answer to the question about the collection of actions will be explained.

original: las zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: las zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In the verse that begins with “action,”

original: las gang dang gang gis rnal 'byor pas de byed par rtsom na /
analyzed: las gang dang gang gis rnal 'byor pas de byed par rtsom na /
translated: whatever action the yogi begins to perform,

original: de dang 'dra ba'i sbyor ba ni ting nge 'dzin la dmigs par bya'o //
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba'i sbyor ba ni ting nge 'dzin la dmigs par bya'o //
translated: that similar application should be visualized in samādhi.

original: zhi ba'am drag po'am de dang mthun pa'i dkyil 'khor bya'o zhes tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: zhi ba'am drag po'am de dang mthun pa'i dkyil 'khor bya'o zhes tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: The mandala of the peaceful or the wrathful, or one that is similar to them, is the remainder of the sentence.

original: lhan cig drag po'i las la khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bskyed cing nam mkha'i dbyings la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dam tshig mi bzad pa ni drag shul gyi spyod pa bsgom par zhu bar bya'o //
analyzed: lhan cig drag po'i las la khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bskyed cing nam mkha'i dbyings la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dam tshig mi bzad pa ni drag shul gyi spyod pa bsgom par zhu bar bya'o //
translated: Together with the wrathful action, one should generate the mandala of the wrathful ones, and request the Tathagatas who reside in the realm of space to meditate on the unbearable pledge, which is the conduct of wrath.

original: dam tshig ni rang gi bdag nyid kyi lus te sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bon gyis byin gyis brlabs la bsrung bar bya'o //
analyzed: dam tshig ni rang gi bdag nyid kyi lus te sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bon gyis byin gyis brlabs la bsrung bar bya'o //
translated: The pledge is one's own body, and the vajra of body, speech, and mind is consecrated with the seed syllables of the Tathagatas, and should be protected.

original: yang na gtsug tor dam tshig ni gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba la sogs pa khro bo'i 'khor lo spro zhing /
analyzed: yang na gtsug tor dam tshig ni gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba la sogs pa khro bo'i 'khor lo spro zhing /
translated: Alternatively, the pledge of the uṣṇīṣa is the emanation of the circle of wrathful ones such as the uṣṇīṣa Cakravartin,

original: ji ltar cho ga gsungs pa las byung ba ni rtog pa las gsungs pa'i cho ga'i rim pa las 'byung ba srung ba'i 'khor lo bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar cho ga gsungs pa las byung ba ni rtog pa las gsungs pa'i cho ga'i rim pa las 'byung ba srung ba'i 'khor lo bcing bar bya'o //
translated: and arisen from the ritual as taught is the binding of the protection wheel that arises from the sequence of rituals taught in the tantra.

original: de ni khro bo'i rgyal po'i 'khor lo ste /🔽de dang rjes su mthun pa ni de dang 'dra ba'i dbus kyi gtso bo'i tshul gyis rang @317a * //
analyzed: de ni khro bo'i rgyal po'i 'khor lo ste / de dang rjes su mthun pa ni de dang 'dra ba'i dbus kyi gtso bo'i tshul gyis rang @317a * //
translated: That is the wheel of the King of Wrathful Ones.

original: gi 'khor lo ni khro bo'i 'khor la bka' bsgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: gi 'khor lo ni khro bo'i 'khor la bka' bsgo bar bya'o //
translated: In accordance with that, one should command one's own wheel of wrathful ones in the manner of the principal one in the center, who is similar to that.

original: de bzhin du sgrub pa ni gdug pa'i bdag nyid lus gang yin pa de yang dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bsgom par bya'o //🔽de nas de'i nyes pa ni dkon mchog gsum la sogs pa la gnod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi las ngan pa ste ;
analyzed: de bzhin du sgrub pa ni gdug pa'i bdag nyid lus gang yin pa de yang dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bsgom par bya'o // de nas de'i nyes pa ni dkon mchog gsum la sogs pa la gnod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi las ngan pa ste ;
translated: Similarly, the practice is that one should visualize in the center of the maṇḍala the body of the one who is to be accomplished, who has a wrathful nature.

original: de'i lus la gnas pa'i 'khor lo la ni 'gro ba thams cad la khyab par byed pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsgrags par bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de'i lus la gnas pa'i 'khor lo la ni 'gro ba thams cad la khyab par byed pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsgrags par bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
translated: Then, one should proclaim to the tathāgatas, who pervade all worlds, the evil karma that is the fault of that [body], which has the characteristic of harming the Three Jewels, and so on.🔽This is how it is done:

original: 'di ni dkon mchog gsum gnod byed //
analyzed: 'di ni dkon mchog gsum gnod byed //
translated: This one harms the Three Jewels,

original: pha dang ma ni gsod par dga' //
analyzed: pha dang ma ni gsod par dga' //
translated: and delights in killing father and mother,

original: dam pa'i chos la smod brtson pa //
analyzed: dam pa'i chos la smod brtson pa //
translated: endeavors to slander the sublime Dharma,

original: slob dpon gsod cing gdul bar dka' //
analyzed: slob dpon gsod cing gdul bar dka' //
translated: and kills the master, being difficult to tame.

original: bstan pa la sogs rim pas kyang //
analyzed: bstan pa la sogs rim pas kyang //
translated: and the teachings, and so on, in order.

original: lam la brten pa ma yin pa //
analyzed: lam la brten pa ma yin pa //
translated: Not relying on the path,

original: bcom ldan 'das de ring bdag gis ni //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ring bdag gis ni //
translated: Blessed One, today I will

original: de la drag shul mngon spyod bgyi //
analyzed: de la drag shul mngon spyod bgyi //
translated: perform fierce rites of destruction against him.

original: des dam tshig bsgrag pa'o //
analyzed: des dam tshig bsgrag pa'o //
translated: This is the proclamation of the sacred pledge.

original: de nas gdug pa'i sems can de la gsad par bya ba'i don du khro bo de dag byung ba ni phyogs bcur song bar bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas gdug pa'i sems can de la gsad par bya ba'i don du khro bo de dag byung ba ni phyogs bcur song bar bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Then, for the sake of killing that evil being, those wrathful ones should be visualized as going to the ten directions.

original: de rnams kyis de bkug cing rang gi 'khor lo ni khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bcug nas /
analyzed: de rnams kyis de bkug cing rang gi 'khor lo ni khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bcug nas /
translated: They summon him and, having brought him into the center of the mandala of wrathful ones,

original: ral gri la sogs pas gcod par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: ral gri la sogs pas gcod par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: he should be visualized as being cut to pieces with swords and so forth.

original: yang na ji ltar gsungs pa ni le'u bco lnga pa las gsungs pa'i rdzas ni de las byung ba ni bskyed pa /
analyzed: yang na ji ltar gsungs pa ni le'u bco lnga pa las gsungs pa'i rdzas ni de las byung ba ni bskyed pa /
translated: Or else, as it is said, the substance is that which is produced from it,

original: gzugs brnyan ni de dang 'dra ba'i gzugs te /
