translated: or “assembly” is heard,

original: bris pa dang / 'dri bar byed du bcug pa dang / nyan pa dang / klog pa dang / sems pa dang / sgom pa la sogs pa gang yin pa /
analyzed: bris pa dang / 'dri bar byed du bcug pa dang / nyan pa dang / klog pa dang / sems pa dang / sgom pa la sogs pa gang yin pa /
translated: or whatever is written, or caused to be written, or listened to, or read, or contemplated, or meditated upon, and so on.

original: @323b dad par byed pa ni sems dad par byed pa dang / de bzhin du sngar ma lus pa dran par bshad cing phyogs gcig dran par yang bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: @323b dad par byed pa ni sems dad par byed pa dang / de bzhin du sngar ma lus pa dran par bshad cing phyogs gcig dran par yang bshad par bya ste /
translated: “ One who has faith” is one who has faith in the mind, and likewise, it is explained that one should recollect all of the above without exception, and one should recollect one part.🔽“ Recollecting one part” is either recollecting one part of the syllables or recollecting one part of the meaning.

original: phyogs gcig dran pa ni yi ge phyogs gcig dran pa dang / don gyi phyogs gcig dran pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub chen po ni rdo rje 'chang chen po dang 'dra bas /
analyzed: phyogs gcig dran pa ni yi ge phyogs gcig dran pa dang / don gyi phyogs gcig dran pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub chen po ni rdo rje 'chang chen po dang 'dra bas /
translated: “ One who has faith in the great enlightenment” is one who has faith in the great enlightenment that is similar to Vajradhara.

original: de la rtag phyag 'tshal ba ni phyag 'tshal ba ni phyag btsal ba dang btud de zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de la rtag phyag 'tshal ba ni phyag 'tshal ba ni phyag btsal ba dang btud de zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “ One who always pays homage to that” is one who pays homage and bows down.

original: bstod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i 'og tu /
analyzed: bstod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i 'og tu /
translated: After the verse of praise,

original: rjes su yi rang ba bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: rjes su yi rang ba bshad par bya ste /
translated: The rejoicing is to be explained.

original: bstod pa'i tshig 'di ni sngar bshad pa'i bstod pa'i tshig gis bstod cing bshad nas /
analyzed: bstod pa'i tshig 'di ni sngar bshad pa'i bstod pa'i tshig gis bstod cing bshad nas /
translated: Having praised and explained with the words of praise explained above,

original: 'dren pa kun ni dkyil 'khor ba dang bcas pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po la ste /
analyzed: 'dren pa kun ni dkyil 'khor ba dang bcas pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po la ste /
translated: the leaders, together with the mandala, are the great Vajradhara.

original: de'i don ni bstan pa'i rnam pa dang / sgrub pa po dang bstan par bya ba la bstod cing /
analyzed: de'i don ni bstan pa'i rnam pa dang / sgrub pa po dang bstan par bya ba la bstod cing /
translated: The meaning of that is: having praised the aspect of the teaching, the practitioner, and the teaching,

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag rgyud ni rgyun te rgyu dang thabs dang 'bras bu'i dbye bas rnam pa gsum mo //
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag rgyud ni rgyun te rgyu dang thabs dang 'bras bu'i dbye bas rnam pa gsum mo //
translated: then those bodhisattvas, the continuum is the stream, which is threefold by the division of cause, method, and result.

original: rgyud kun ni bya ba dang / spyod pa dang / rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud de /
analyzed: rgyud kun ni bya ba dang / spyod pa dang / rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud de /
translated: All tantras are the tantras of action, conduct, and highest yoga.

original: de rnams kyi dngos grub dang ting nge 'dzin gtso bo yin pas na bdag po'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi dngos grub dang ting nge 'dzin gtso bo yin pas na bdag po'o //
translated: Since the powers and meditative concentrations are the chief of those, they are the lords.

original: bde ba'i thabs yin pa'i phyir mchog go //
analyzed: bde ba'i thabs yin pa'i phyir mchog go //
translated: Since they are the means of bliss, they are supreme.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed pa'i rgyu yin pas na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed pa'i rgyu yin pas na /
translated: Since they are the cause of the generation of all tathāgatas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do//
translated: they are all tathāgatas.

original: gsang ba ni bya ba'i rgyud la sogs par zhugs pa la bstan par mi bya'o //
analyzed: gsang ba ni bya ba'i rgyud la sogs par zhugs pa la bstan par mi bya'o //
translated: Secret means that it should not be taught to those who have entered Action and other tantras.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sdud par byed pas na 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sdud par byed pas na 'dus pa'o //
translated: It is a gathering because it gathers all the Tathagatas.

original: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyu yin pas na 'byung ba'o //🔽legs par mnyan pas na legs par gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyu yin pas na 'byung ba'o // legs par mnyan pas na legs par gsungs pa yin te /
translated: It is an origin because it is the cause of mundane and supramundane powers.🔽It is well spoken because it is well heard.

original: legs par bka' stsal pa'o //
analyzed: legs par bka' stsal pa'o //
translated: It is well spoken because it is well taught.

original: 'di ni dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud de //
analyzed: 'di ni dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud de //
translated: This is the glorious Guhyasamaja Tantra.

original: rjes yi rang ni mngon par dga' zhing nye bar bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: rjes yi rang ni mngon par dga' zhing nye bar bsdu ba'o //
translated: Rejoicing is delighting in and gathering.

original: de ni las kyi rgyal po mchog go //🔽'di skad gsungs nas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de ni las kyi rgyal po mchog go // 'di skad gsungs nas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: That is the supreme king of actions.

original: bstod pa'i tshig brjod nas so //
analyzed: bstod pa'i tshig brjod nas so //
translated: Having spoken thus means having uttered the words of praise.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa dang byams pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa dang byams pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The Tathagatas and Bodhisattvas are Akshobhya and so forth, and Maitreya and so forth.

original: nyid kyi sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje 'chang chen po pa /
analyzed: nyid kyi sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje 'chang chen po pa /
translated: His own body, speech and mind are the Great Vajradhara.

original: sku la sogs pa la rang gi sku la sogs pa zhugs shing gcig tu gyur te /
analyzed: sku la sogs pa la rang gi sku la sogs pa zhugs shing gcig tu gyur te /
translated: The bodies, etc., enter into his own body, etc., and become one.

original: gnyis su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mi gsung bar gyur pa ni bde ba chen po dmigs @324a * //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mi gsung bar gyur pa ni bde ba chen po dmigs @324a * //
translated: The non-dual samadhi becomes silent, and he abides in the observation of great bliss.

original: te gnas par gyur to zhes rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: te gnas par gyur to zhes rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: This is the completion stage.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i sku gsung thugs ni sngags sam gzugs te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i sku gsung thugs ni sngags sam gzugs te /
translated: All Tathagatas are the bodies, speech, and minds of Akshobhya, etc., which are the mantras or forms.

original: de rnams kyi gsang ba ni sba bar bya ba /
analyzed: de rnams kyi gsang ba ni sba bar bya ba /
translated: Their secret is to be guarded.

original: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang ldan pa rgyud kyi rgyal po'i gsang ba thams cad de /
analyzed: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang ldan pa rgyud kyi rgyal po'i gsang ba thams cad de /
translated: The glorious Guhyasamaja is the king of tantras endowed with the accumulations of merit and wisdom, and all its secrets.🔽The words of inquiry and the words of the path that teach them are blessed.

original: 'dri ba'i tshig dang / de rnams kyi ston pa ni lam gyi tshig ste de dag byin gyis rlob brjod par byed pa gang yin pa de ni gsang ba thams cad ston pa rdo rje ye shes kyis byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'dri ba'i tshig dang / de rnams kyi ston pa ni lam gyi tshig ste de dag byin gyis rlob brjod par byed pa gang yin pa de ni gsang ba thams cad ston pa rdo rje ye shes kyis byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The one who expresses them is called the blessing of all secrets, the vajra wisdom.

original: le'u zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: le'u zhes bya ba la /
translated: Chapter

original: ji ltar gos kyis chu sbrang la sogs pa las srung ba de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa sel bar byed pas na gos dang 'dra ba ste de 'dzin cing len par byed pas na pa ta la ste /
analyzed: ji ltar gos kyis chu sbrang la sogs pa las srung ba de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa sel bar byed pas na gos dang 'dra ba ste de 'dzin cing len par byed pas na pa ta la ste /
translated: Just as clothing protects from water, mosquitoes, flies, etc., so it is similar to clothing in that it removes the obscurations of the afflictions. It is a pattra, because it takes up and holds that.

original: de rjod par byed pa'i gzhung gi tshogs la yang le'u zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de rjod par byed pa'i gzhung gi tshogs la yang le'u zhes bya'o //
translated: The collection of texts that express that is also called a chapter.

original: tshig gi don bcu drug go //🔽rgyud kyi 'grel pa las le'u bco brgyad pa'i tshig gi don rgya cher bshad pa'o //
analyzed: tshig gi don bcu drug go // rgyud kyi 'grel pa las le'u bco brgyad pa'i tshig gi don rgya cher bshad pa'o //
translated: There are sixteen topics.

original: de ltar gsang ba 'dus pa yi //
analyzed: de ltar gsang ba 'dus pa yi //
translated: This is the extensive explanation of the words and topics of the eighteenth chapter in the commentary on the tantra.🔽Thus, the bodhicitta

original: byang chub sems ni rab gsal byed //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni rab gsal byed //
translated: of the Guhyasamaja is made clear.

original: bla ma'i zhal nas rnyed nas ni //
analyzed: bla ma'i zhal nas rnyed nas ni //
translated: Having obtained it from the guru's mouth,

original: rgyud 'grel bdag gis 'di nyid byas //
analyzed: rgyud 'grel bdag gis 'di nyid byas //
translated: I, the commentator, have composed this.

original: tshig gsal mdo rgyu spun las byung //
analyzed: tshig gsal mdo rgyu spun las byung //
translated: The words and meanings arise from the Sutra and Tantra collections.

original: thabs dang shes rab me 'bar ba //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab me 'bar ba //
translated: The fire of method and wisdom blazes.

original: klu sgrub snying po bdag gis ni //
analyzed: klu sgrub snying po bdag gis ni //
translated: I, Nagabodhi,

original: mdor na 'grel pa sdom du bsdus ;
analyzed: mdor na 'grel pa sdom du bsdus ;
translated: have summarized the commentary in brief.

original: / dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' dang // gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud rgyal dang // bla ma la ni dad che bas //
analyzed: / dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' dang // gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud rgyal dang // bla ma la ni dad che bas //
translated: and great faith in the guru,

original: gang zhig 'gro la phan 'dogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig 'gro la phan 'dogs pa'o //
translated: who benefits beings.

original: dpal ldan rgyal po de gzhon nu //
analyzed: dpal ldan rgyal po de gzhon nu //
translated: That glorious king, when young,

original: dus su lo ni bco brgyad la //
analyzed: dus su lo ni bco brgyad la //
translated: at the age of eighteen,

original: 'phags pa lha yis byas pa'i dpal ldan gnas ni shar phyogs su //
analyzed: 'phags pa lha yis byas pa'i dpal ldan gnas ni shar phyogs su //
translated: in the glorious place made by the noble deity in the east,

original: dge slong rnams kyi gtsug lag khang gi phyogs gzhan gyis gsal bar btab pas //
analyzed: dge slong rnams kyi gtsug lag khang gi phyogs gzhan gyis gsal bar btab pas //
translated: the monastery of the monks,

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i drin gyis bdag gis rgyud 'grel 'di ni rnam par brtsams //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i drin gyis bdag gis rgyud 'grel 'di ni rnam par brtsams //
translated: I composed this commentary on the tantra through the kindness of Vajrasattva.

original: dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi ni //🔽'grel pa sgron ma rnam rgyas dang // nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib pa mun //
analyzed: dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi ni // 'grel pa sgron ma rnam rgyas dang // nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib pa mun //
translated: The commentary on the glorious Guhyasamaja Tantra,🔽the Lamp of the Extensive Commentary,

original: de nyid kyis ni 'joms par shog /🔽dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i 'grel pa rdo rje theg pa chen po pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyis ni 'joms par shog / dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i 'grel pa rdo rje theg pa chen po pa /
translated: may it destroy the darkness of the afflictive and knowledge obscurations.🔽The commentary on the king of tantras, the glorious Guhyasamaja,

original: dpal klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: dpal klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: composed by the glorious Nagarjuna, is complete.

original: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po dpal gzhon nu bum pa'i zhal snga nas kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o /
analyzed: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po dpal gzhon nu bum pa'i zhal snga nas kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o /
translated: Translated and finalized by the great Indian abbot Śrī Jñānagarbha.
